name: I Think I'm in Love with a Demon Prince
name_original: I Think I'm in Love with a Demon Prince
description:
In a realm where the nature of love reigns supreme, the female angels of Yurei clash with the male demons of Jomon. Dive into a narrative where your journey unfolds amidst a war of contrasting ideologies. Now choose your own adventure and let your story unfold!




  • Captivating Visual Novel Storytelling: Delve into a narrative-rich world where the nature of love influences the fate of kingdoms.
  • Innovative Tower Defense Mechanics: Defend your realm with towers empowered by mystical gems, each offering unique strategic advantages.
  • Real-Time Strategy Dynamics: Engage in resource management and infrastructure development reminiscent of classic RTS games.
  • Strategic Battlefield Manipulation: Master the art of 'Tactical Terrain Alteration' to control enemy paths and create strategic choke points.
  • Potent Spellcasting Abilities: Change the course of battles with powerful spells, each providing critical tactical benefits.




  • Attack Gems: Amplify your towers with devastating area-of-effect spells and chain-reaction magic.
  • Elemental Gems: Infuse towers with elemental powers to shock, burn, freeze, or poison adversaries.
  • Support Gems: Elevate your towers' defensive and offensive capabilities for a strategic edge.




  • Resource and Economy Building: Harvest resources and build structures to bolster your defenses.
  • Dynamic Tower Defense: Utilize various towers, each customizable with magical gems, to fend off diverse enemy forces.
  • Tactical Terrain Alteration: Creatively modify the battlefield with strategically placed barriers and traps, influencing enemy movements and strategies.
  • Explore our visually stunning world through beautifully crafted artwork. See the fusion of strategy and fantasy come to life.




Share your strategies, stories, and feedback. Join the vibrant community of "Demon Prince" and contribute to its evolving world.




Once upon a time in a medieval realm, nestled among rolling hills and lush forests, stood the majestic Kingdom of Yurei, home to a remarkable community of female angels. Within its halls, the air was filled with a sense of serenity and camaraderie. Castle Yurei was led by Queen Seraph and her daughter, Princess Tennyo, a wise and compassionate set of angels who embodied strength and grace. In this realm, same-sex love was the only celebrated and embraced love.

However, not far from Castle Yurei, atop a forbidding mountain, loomed the imposing Kingdom Jomon. Within its dark and brooding walls resided a sinister community of demonic same-sex loving men. Led by Prince Akuma, a fearsome and power-hungry figure, their civilization thrives on discord and chaos. Prince Akuma sought to spread his twisted ideology throughout the realm. Prince Akuma has declared war, driven by his hatred for the harmonious existence of Castle Yurei. The angels, determined to protect their sanctuary and their way of life, prepared for battle. Meanwhile, within Castle Jomon, the gay demons assembled under Prince Akuma’s command. With flames flickering in their eyes and fire coursing through their veins, they prepared to unleash their demonic powers upon Castle Yurei. Their mission was to extinguish the light of love, replacing it with blood and chaos.

And so it begins...

...what will you do?
